text: Nueva Ecija's 2nd congressional district is one of the four congressional districts of the Philippines in the province of Nueva Ecija. It has been represented in the House of Representatives of the Philippines since 1928. The district consists of the northern cities of Muñoz and San Jose, as well as adjacent municipalities of Carranglan, Llanera, Lupao, Pantabangan, Rizal and Talugtug. It is currently represented in the 18th Congress by Micaela S. Violago of the National Unity Party (NUP). ==Representation history== {| class=wikitable |- ! rowspan="2" | # ! rowspan="2" colspan=2 | Member ! colspan=2 | Term of office ! rowspan="2" | Legislature !
